content: I think I've got a good idea of how to maintain and clean my Moroccan-inspired rug. Thanks for the tips! Since I've already decluttered and vacuumed the entire room, I'm excited to find the perfect rug to complement the clean and minimalist vibe I'm going for. Do you have any recommendations for other home decor items that would complement a Moroccan-inspired rug and a light gray sectional sofa with a subtle pattern?
